attributes.action: Mortgage interest payments Clawback on death.
attributes.additional_details:
Totally unfair.
We could have sold and rented. Government paid more. Tenants wont payback rent paid.
1.Recognise Caring is work. Admit carers save the government a great deal of money by doing the job they do. Proper money means contribution to the economy,no monthly finance juggling. Peace of mind for carer.
2.Government should pay a proper rate to carers who'd had to give up work.
